creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi
description: three images; central image of brown wall with large white tiles--many missing, one displaced--in three sections; red and white striped band at bottom, with "DANGER / NO CLEARANCE" in red on sign at center of striped band; left and right images are partial views of same scene
image_copyright: © Kenji Nakahashi %2F Center for Creative Photography%2C Arizona Board of Regents
markings: on back at LRC stamped in black: Printed by Keni Nakahashi in 1999
signed: on back at LLC in black: \"SUBWAY WALL (Whitehall Street - South Ferry, Broadway Line \"R\", New York City)\" 1989 K. Nakahashi
title: Subway Wall (Whitehall Street - South Ferry Broadway Line "R", New York City)
